## Setup
1. Login to the lab computer.    
2. Navigate to github.com and login.  
3. Find the class repository "datascibiol" (https://github.com/jmledford3115/datascibiol).  
4. Download a copy the class repository to the desktop.  
5. Clone your repository to the desktop using GitHub Desktop.  
6. Copy the files for today's lab from the class repository and paste them into **your** repository.  
7. Open today's lab in RStudio.  

## Midterm 1 De-Brief
1. Thank you for following the upload instructions! If you don't follow instructions and we have to complete upload for you, expect a minor deduction.  
2. Please use tidyverse functions for all data manipulation and plotting.  
3. Visuals almost always look better in color.  
4. As we focus more on interpretation, be sure not to simply re-state the question in your answers.  
5. Nearly every plot also asks for a written interpretation.  
6. Please provide one answer per question.
